actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act, to provide that an individual may simultaneously receive both an old-age or disability insurance benefit and a specially reduced widow's or widower's insurance benefit.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Provides, under Title II of the Social Security Act Old-Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) that an individual may simultaneously receive both an old-age or disability insurance benefit and a specially reduced widow's or widower's insurance benefit.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act, to provide that an individual may simultaneously receive both an old-age or disability insurance benefit and a specially reduced widow's or widower's insurance benefit.
